channel.title: [Req]Xat Chat BackGround[Req]
channel.description:
well what i had in mine was the background border like this: [url=http://miroroxdiamond.deviantart.com/art/Xat-Chat-Room-BG-Template-137496994?moodonly=24]http://miroroxdiamond.deviantart.com/art/Xat-Chat-Room-BG-Template-137496994?moodonly=24[/url]
And a the theme i was thinking somethings of like cracking glass effect with the name TrisidiaX as the cause of the cracking
i was thinking of the text of TrisidiaX look something like this
[url=http://violinonline.ru/img/f9/f9f/Cinema_4D_Thrausi_Text_Tutorial_MUST_WATCH_acrezHD.jpg]http://violinonline.ru/img/f9/f9f/Cinema_4D_Thrausi_Text_Tutorial_MUST_WATCH_acrezHD.jpg[/url]
and the color of it prob cyan/blue ish
and at the bottom of the chat box where you type if you could add "Type Here" in a fancy text that you would perfer then could you please do so?
Well thats it hope someone can get it looking good!

item.title: [Req]Xat Chat BackGround[Req]

well what i had in mine was the background border like this:
